item.title: There's probably no Dawkins...
item.author: Joshua Fountain,
item.description: In 2006, with the publication of Richard Dawkins’ “The God Delusion”, modern atheism found a new vigour. The book has sold over 2 million copies worldwide and is highly regarded by many as being a powerful rational argument against belief in God. Dawkins, described by many as being “evangelistic” or …
